text.p: You've only got one lead about where to go next: the silver plaque with the word 'Endimion' on it. You are forced to spend valuable time here in Rentarn trying to find out what this clue means. Each day you spend here, 2 is added to your Time Track.
You are also being hunted by the militia, so there is a chance you will be caught.

Also, each day you have to pay for food; you must deduct 1 Gold Piece, or 1 unit of Provisions, each day you are in Rentarn. If at any time you get desperately short of food, you can spend one day doing menial labour in the town and earn enough to buy 3 Provisions (but 2 is added to your Time Track if you do this). Now, how will you try to find out what this single clue, 'Endimion', means? Will you:

td.a: Look for a place called Endimion?
Ask around for a person named Endimion?
Try to find out more about the grey-robed men?
